search.query: index="uipath" sourcetype="uipath_logs" level=Information | stats sum(totalExecutionTimeInSeconds) as RunTimeinSeconds by processName | eval RunTimeinHours=RunTimeinSeconds/3600 | lookup rpm_roi Process_Name AS processName OUTPUTNEW Hourly_Cost as Hourly_Cost, Dev_Cost as Dev_Cost, Manual_Time_(min) as Manual_Time_(min) | accum "Manual_Time_(min)" as Time_Spent | accum Hourly_Cost as Total_Dollars | eval Time_Spent=Time_Spent*60 | eval Total_Money_Saved=Total_Dollars*RunTimeinHours | eval Total_Savings=RunTimeinHours*Total_Dollars | eval Total_Savings=RunTimeinHours*Total_Dollars | stats sum(Total_Savings) as "$ Dollars Saved"

index="uipath" sourcetype="uipath_logs" level=Information | stats sum(totalExecutionTimeInSeconds) as RunTimeinSeconds by processName | eval RunTimeinHours=RunTimeinSeconds/3600 | lookup rpm_roi Process_Name AS processName OUTPUTNEW Hourly_Cost as Hourly_Cost, Dev_Cost as Dev_Cost, Manual_Time_(min) as Manual_Time_(min) | accum "Manual_Time_(min)" as Time_Spent | accum Hourly_Cost as Total_Dollars | eval Time_Spent=Time_Spent*60 | eval Total_Money_Saved=Total_Dollars*RunTimeinHours | eval Total_Savings=RunTimeinHours*Total_Dollars | eval Total_Savings=RunTimeinHours*Total_Dollars | stats sum(RunTimeinHours)

index="uipath" sourcetype="uipath_logs" level=Information "Jobs{}.Type"=Unattended | stats sum(totalExecutionTimeInSeconds) as RunTimeinSeconds by processName | eval RunTimeinHours=RunTimeinSeconds/3600 | lookup rpm_roi Process_Name AS processName OUTPUTNEW Hourly_Cost as Hourly_Cost, Dev_Cost as Dev_Cost, Manual_Time_(min) as Manual_Time_(min) | accum "Manual_Time_(min)" as Time_Spent | accum Hourly_Cost as Total_Dollars | eval Time_Spent=Time_Spent*60 | eval Total_Money_Saved=Total_Dollars*RunTimeinHours | eval Total_Savings=RunTimeinHours*Total_Dollars | eval Total_Savings=RunTimeinHours*Total_Dollars | stats sum(RunTimeinHours)

index="uipath" sourcetype="uipath_logs" level=Information "Jobs{}.Type"=Attended | stats sum(totalExecutionTimeInSeconds) as RunTimeinSeconds by processName | eval RunTimeinHours=RunTimeinSeconds/3600 | lookup rpm_roi Process_Name AS processName OUTPUTNEW Hourly_Cost as Hourly_Cost, Dev_Cost as Dev_Cost, Manual_Time_(min) as Manual_Time_(min) | accum "Manual_Time_(min)" as Time_Spent | accum Hourly_Cost as Total_Dollars | eval Time_Spent=Time_Spent*60 | eval Total_Money_Saved=Total_Dollars*RunTimeinHours | eval Total_Savings=RunTimeinHours*Total_Dollars | eval Total_Savings=RunTimeinHours*Total_Dollars | stats sum(RunTimeinHours)

index="uipath" sourcetype="uipath_logs" level=Information | stats sum(totalExecutionTimeInSeconds) as RunTimeinSeconds by processName | eval RunTimeinHours=RunTimeinSeconds/3600 | lookup rpm_roi Process_Name AS processName OUTPUTNEW Hourly_Cost as Hourly_Cost, Dev_Cost as Dev_Cost, Manual_Time_(min) as Manual_Time_(min) | accum "Manual_Time_(min)" as Time_Spent | accum Hourly_Cost as Total_Dollars | eval Time_Spent=Time_Spent*60 | eval Total_Money_Saved=Total_Dollars*RunTimeinHours | eval Total_Savings=RunTimeinHours*Total_Dollars | eval Total_Savings=RunTimeinHours*Total_Dollars | stats sum(Total_Savings) by processName | rename sum(Total_Savings) as "$ Dollars Saved"

index="uipath" sourcetype="uipath_logs" level=Information | stats sum(totalExecutionTimeInSeconds) as RunTimeinSeconds by processName | eval RunTimeinHours=RunTimeinSeconds/3600 | lookup rpm_roi Process_Name AS processName OUTPUTNEW Hourly_Cost as Hourly_Cost, Dev_Cost as Dev_Cost, Manual_Time_(min) as Manual_Time_(min) | accum "Manual_Time_(min)" as Time_Spent | accum Hourly_Cost as Total_Dollars | eval Time_Spent=Time_Spent*60 | eval Total_Money_Saved=Total_Dollars*RunTimeinHours | eval Total_Savings=RunTimeinHours*Total_Dollars | eval Total_Savings=RunTimeinHours*Total_Dollars | eventstats sum(processName) by Time_Spent
| inputlookup rpm_roi | table Process_Name, Manual_Time_(min), Hourly_Cost, Number_of_FTE's, Dev_Cost
